#summary How to install Glossword 1.9?
#labels 1.9,FAQ,Featured
= How to install =

 # Log in to Joomla as Administrator and install the component. Follow Extensions -> Install/Uninstall. Select file `glossword-1.9.x--component--joomla-1.5.zip`.
 # After installation, configure Glossword component. Follow Components -> Glossword -> Configure component. Review the values and SAVE the configuration.
 # Add component to any of Joomla menus (for example Top menu, Main menu).

Now you should be able to use Glossword component.
